title: Manganese dissolution in alkaline medium with and without concurrent oxygen evolution in LiMn2O4
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,504-514
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00434A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Omeshwari Yadorao Bisen, Max Baumung, Michael Tatzel, Cynthia A. Volkert, Marcel Risch
Manganese oxides such as LiMn2O4 exhibit two distinct Mn dissolution processes; one independent of oxygen evolution and the other associated with it. Less Mn4+ before the onset of the OER lowers the Mn dissolution rate.
